ikuth 09 da sawasa mema randamwal kollaya sidukara aththe halawatha sedauyana parediya.thama padinchi niwase sita diyaniyage niwesata sedauyana pare yamin sitina wita idiriyen pamini motar rathayak nawatha pamini ayek kisiyam ayek pilibandawa wimasa siti bawath ewani ayek pilibandawa thaman nodanna bawa pawasu wita anna ara gahe garandiyek yanawa yayi kiya thama ee desa baladdima idiriyata pana thamage kare palanda siti rupiyal 60,000k watina randamwala kadagena gos nawatha thibu wahanaye nangi palagiya bawath, halawatha sedauyana padinchi perumal rukmani (awu:60) yana ayek mema randamwal kollaya pilibandawa halawatha polisiyata paminili karamin pawasa atha.

manda ohu yahapathya.+ohuge imahath premaya* sadahatama pawathinneya.+ 2 yehowa dewi wisin galawagath janayeni, ohuta prashansa karanna.+manda ohu sathurage athin obawa beragaththeya.+ 3 wisiri siti deshayangen obawa pitathata genawith ekata ek ras kaleya.+nangenahirenda basnahirenda+uthurenda dakunenda ohu obawa ekathu karagaththeya.+ 4 ohuge senanga palukaraye ee me atha awidimin jiwath wunoya.+ee wiyali deshaye+ wasaya kirimata nuwarak owunta samba nowuneya.+ 5 owunta kannawath bonnawath kisiwak nothibuneya.+owuhu dinen dina maranaye abiyasatama paminiyoya.+ 6 owunge dukedi owuhu digatama yehowa dewita handagasuwoya.+owun addutu duk gahatawalin dewi owunwa beragaththeya.+ 7 wasaya kirimata nuwarak samba wana thek+dewi owunwa hari margaye gena giyeya.+ 8 janayeni, yehowa dewita sthuthi karanna.

api godak aya ahala thiyena sinduwa kallak thamayi ....eda chulla paduma rajathumage....kiyala thiyenne...kathawa saralawa mehemayi...rajathumata kumarawaru 7 denayi....dawasak maha raja si maduru kawuluwen eliya balanakota kota penawa me hath dena senawa piriwaran raja sewayata ena aakaraya..dakala rajathuma bayawenawa thamange rajyaya me kumarawaru paharaganida kiyala..kumarawaru wahama raskarawana rajathuma waha nopenena aathakata pala yanna kiyala rajathuma raja ana nikuth karanawa..methek boheama yasata hitapu kumarawaru thamange thibuna siyaluma sesatha haradamala thamunge kumariyoth ekka bohoma akamaththen piyarajage rajadhaniyen nikmenawa..eeth ee kumarawaru yali paminidaka yahathin jiwath wenna oona karana wasthuwa nidan karala ee wasthu sambhara thiben than me hama kumarayekutama pennanna maha rajathuma pasubata une na.giyata mokada me ayata hamu wenne maha nirudaka kantharayak kantharaye penamaneka bethakatawath otuwekwath hoyaganna bari una..aahara prashnaya bohoma thadin danuna...passe beාhoma akamaththen wunath kattiya ekathuwela balama kumariwa marala bedagena kawa...ayi balama kumarayata thamange kalla mulinma ahimi une kiyala nam hithaganna ba...ethakota wadimahalu kumaraya thamayi paduma...paduma kumaraya thamunta labuna minimas kallen kotahak lunu damala aran thiya gaththa.
